Oh-I-guess-I-should-cross

 

Oh, I guess I should cross post this. After a month of hard work on an entry for NESMaker’s Byte Off competition, Pingback is playable. Coming up with music that was actually listenable was probably my favorite part of the project. Please check out all the entries here.
